Member Function Documentation

◆ _UpdateGameTime()

void World::_UpdateGameTime ( )
protected

Update the game time.

  • update the time
  • if there is a shutdown timer
  • ... and it is overdue, stop the world (set m_stopEvent)
  • ... else decrease it and if necessary display a shutdown countdown to the users

Definition at line 2686 of file World.cpp.

2687 {
2689  time_t thisTime = time(nullptr);
2690  uint32 elapsed = uint32(thisTime - m_gameTime);
2691  m_gameTime = thisTime;
2692  m_gameMSTime = getMSTime();
2693 
2695  if (!IsStopped() && m_ShutdownTimer > 0 && elapsed > 0)
2696  {
2698  if (m_ShutdownTimer <= elapsed)
2699  {
2700  if (!(m_ShutdownMask & SHUTDOWN_MASK_IDLE) || GetActiveAndQueuedSessionCount() == 0)
2701  m_stopEvent = true; // exist code already set
2702  else
2703  m_ShutdownTimer = 1; // minimum timer value to wait idle state
2704  }
2706  else
2707  {
2708  m_ShutdownTimer -= elapsed;
2709 
2710  ShutdownMsg();
2711  }
2712  }
2713 }
uint32
std::uint32_t uint32

3503

3505 
3506  PreparedQueryResult result = CharacterDatabase.Query(stmt);
3507

3525  fields[6].GetUInt8(), /*level*/
3526  0, /*mail count*/
3527  0 /*guild id*/
3528  );
3529 
3530  itr = _globalPlayerDataStore.find(guid);
3531  if (itr != _globalPlayerDataStore.end())
3532  {
3533  LOG_INFO("server.worldserver", "Player %s [GUID: %u] added to the global storage.", name.c_str(), guid);
3534  return &itr->second;
3535  }
3536  }
3537 
3538  // Player not found
3539  return nullptr;
3540 }

2992  if (hour < 0 || hour > 23)
2993  hour = 0;

2995  tm localTm;
2996  localtime_r(&curr, &localTm);
2997  localTm.tm_hour = hour;
2998  localTm.tm_min = 0;
2999  localTm.tm_sec = 0;
3000  uint32 add;

3004  add = (7 - (localTm.tm_wday - dayOfWeek)) * DAY;

◆ InitCalendarOldEventsDeletionTime()

void World::InitCalendarOldEventsDeletionTime ( )

3067 {
3068  time_t now = time(nullptr);
3069  time_t currentDeletionTime = getWorldState(WS_DAILY_CALENDAR_DELETION_OLD_EVENTS_TIME);
3070  time_t nextDeletionTime = currentDeletionTime ? currentDeletionTime : GetNextTimeWithDayAndHour(-1, getIntConfig(CONFIG_CALENDAR_DELETE_OLD_EVENTS_HOUR));
3071 
3072  // If the reset time saved in the worldstate is before now it means the server was offline when the reset was supposed to occur.
3073  // In this case we set the reset time in the past and next world update will do the reset and schedule next one in the future.
3074  if (currentDeletionTime < now)
3075  m_NextCalendarOldEventsDeletionTime = nextDeletionTime - DAY;
3076  else
3077  m_NextCalendarOldEventsDeletionTime = nextDeletionTime;
3078 
3079  if (!currentDeletionTime)
3080  sWorld->setWorldState(WS_DAILY_CALENDAR_DELETION_OLD_EVENTS_TIME, uint64(m_NextCalendarOldEventsDeletionTime));
3081 }

2680  for (SessionMap::const_iterator itr = m_sessions.begin(); itr != m_sessions.end(); ++itr)
2681  if (itr->second->GetSecurity() < sec)
2682  itr->second->KickPlayer("KickAllLess");
2683 }

Referenced by SetPlayerSecurityLimit().

◆ KickSession()

bool World::KickSession ( uint32  id)
virtual

Remove a given session.

  • Find the session, kick the user, but we can't delete session at this moment to prevent iterator invalidation

Implements IWorld.

◆ LoadConfigSettings()

void World::LoadConfigSettings ( bool  reload = false)
virtual

Initialize config values.

  • Read the player limit and the Message of the day from the config file
  • Read ticket system setting from the config file
  • Get string for new logins (newly created characters)
  • Send server info on login?
  • Read all rates from the config file

  • Read other configuration items from the config file

    Todo:
    Add MonsterSight in worldserver.conf or put it as define
  • Load the CharDelete related config options
  • Load the ItemDelete related config options
  • Read the "Data" directory from the config file

Implements IWorld.

670  m_int_configs[CONFIG_INTERVAL_SAVE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("PlayerSaveInterval", 15 * MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS);
671  m_int_configs[CONFIG_INTERVAL_DISCONNECT_TOLERANCE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("DisconnectToleranceInterval", 0);
672  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_STATS_SAVE_ONLY_ON_LOGOUT] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("PlayerSave.Stats.SaveOnlyOnLogout", true);
673 
674  m_int_configs[CONFIG_MIN_LEVEL_STAT_SAVE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("PlayerSave.Stats.MinLevel", 0);
675  if (m_int_configs[CONFIG_MIN_LEVEL_STAT_SAVE] > MAX_LEVEL || int32(m_int_configs[CONFIG_MIN_LEVEL_STAT_SAVE]) < 0)
676  {
677  LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "PlayerSave.Stats.MinLevel (%i) must be in range 0..80. Using default, do not save character stats (0).", m_int_configs[CONFIG_MIN_LEVEL_STAT_SAVE]);
678  m_int_configs[CONFIG_MIN_LEVEL_STAT_SAVE] = 0;
679  }
680 
681  m_int_configs[CONFIG_INTERVAL_MAPUPDATE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("MapUpdateInterval", 100);
682  if (m_int_configs[CONFIG_INTERVAL_MAPUPDATE] < MIN_MAP_UPDATE_DELAY)
683  {
684  LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "MapUpdateInterval (%i) must be greater %u. Use this minimal value.", m_int_configs[CONFIG_INTERVAL_MAPUPDATE], MIN_MAP_UPDATE_DELAY);
685  m_int_configs[CONFIG_INTERVAL_MAPUPDATE] = MIN_MAP_UPDATE_DELAY;
686  }
687  if (reload)
688  sMapMgr->SetMapUpdateInterval(m_int_configs[CONFIG_INTERVAL_MAPUPDATE]);
689 
690  m_int_configs[CONFIG_INTERVAL_CHANGEWEATHER] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("ChangeWeatherInterval", 10 * MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS);
691 
692  if (reload)
693  {
694  uint32 val = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("WorldServerPort", 8085);
695  if (val != m_int_configs[CONFIG_PORT_WORLD])
696  LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "WorldServerPort option can't be changed at worldserver.conf reload, using current value (%u).", m_int_configs[CONFIG_PORT_WORLD]);
697  }
698  else
699  m_int_configs[CONFIG_PORT_WORLD] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("WorldServerPort", 8085);
700 
701  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_CLOSE_IDLE_CONNECTIONS] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("CloseIdleConnections", true);
702  m_int_configs[CONFIG_SOCKET_TIMEOUTTIME] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("SocketTimeOutTime", 900000);
703  m_int_configs[CONFIG_SOCKET_TIMEOUTTIME_ACTIVE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("SocketTimeOutTimeActive", 60000);
704  m_int_configs[CONFIG_SESSION_ADD_DELAY] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("SessionAddDelay", 10000);
705 
706  m_float_configs[CONFIG_GROUP_XP_DISTANCE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<float>("MaxGroupXPDistance", 74.0f);
707  m_float_configs[CONFIG_MAX_RECRUIT_A_FRIEND_DISTANCE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<float>("MaxRecruitAFriendBonusDistance", 100.0f);
708

711

715  if (val != m_int_configs[CONFIG_GAME_TYPE])

717  }
718  else
719  m_int_configs[CONFIG_GAME_TYPE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("GameType", 0);

737  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_ALLOW_TWO_SIDE_INTERACTION_CHAT] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("AllowTwoSide.Interaction.Chat", false);
738  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_ALLOW_TWO_SIDE_INTERACTION_CHANNEL] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("AllowTwoSide.Interaction.Channel", false);

742  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_ALLOW_TWO_SIDE_INTERACTION_MAIL] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("AllowTwoSide.Interaction.Mail", false);

785  m_int_configs[CONFIG_CHARACTERS_PER_REALM] = 10;
786  }
787 
788  // must be after CONFIG_CHARACTERS_PER_REALM

790  if (m_int_configs[CONFIG_CHARACTERS_PER_ACCOUNT] < m_int_configs[CONFIG_CHARACTERS_PER_REALM])
791  {
792  LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "CharactersPerAccount (%i) can't be less than CharactersPerRealm (%i).", m_int_configs[CONFIG_CHARACTERS_PER_ACCOUNT], m_int_configs[CONFIG_CHARACTERS_PER_REALM]);
793  m_int_configs[CONFIG_CHARACTERS_PER_ACCOUNT] = m_int_configs[CONFIG_CHARACTERS_PER_REALM];
794  }

796  m_int_configs[CONFIG_HEROIC_CHARACTERS_PER_REALM] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("HeroicCharactersPerRealm", 1);
797  if (int32(m_int_configs[CONFIG_HEROIC_CHARACTERS_PER_REALM]) < 0 || m_int_configs[CONFIG_HEROIC_CHARACTERS_PER_REALM] > 10)
798  {
799  LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "HeroicCharactersPerRealm (%i) must be in range 0..10. Set to 1.", m_int_configs[CONFIG_HEROIC_CHARACTERS_PER_REALM]);

817  }

822  {

824  m_int_configs[CONFIG_MAX_PLAYER_LEVEL] = MAX_LEVEL;
825  }

830  if (m_int_configs[CONFIG_START_PLAYER_LEVEL] < 1 || m_int_configs[CONFIG_START_PLAYER_LEVEL] > m_int_configs[CONFIG_MAX_PLAYER_LEVEL])
831  {

833  m_int_configs[CONFIG_START_PLAYER_LEVEL] = 1;

838  {

918  m_int_configs[CONFIG_START_GM_LEVEL] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("GM.StartLevel", 1);
919  if (m_int_configs[CONFIG_START_GM_LEVEL] < m_int_configs[CONFIG_START_PLAYER_LEVEL])
920  {
921  LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "GM.StartLevel (%i) must be in range StartPlayerLevel(%u)..%u. Set to %u.",
922  m_int_configs[CONFIG_START_GM_LEVEL], m_int_configs[CONFIG_START_PLAYER_LEVEL], MAX_LEVEL, m_int_configs[CONFIG_START_PLAYER_LEVEL]);
923  m_int_configs[CONFIG_START_GM_LEVEL] = m_int_configs[CONFIG_START_PLAYER_LEVEL];
924  }
925  else if (m_int_configs[CONFIG_START_GM_LEVEL] > MAX_LEVEL)
926  {
927  LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "GM.StartLevel (%i) must be in range 1..%u. Set to %u.", m_int_configs[CONFIG_START_GM_LEVEL], MAX_LEVEL, MAX_LEVEL);
928  m_int_configs[CONFIG_START_GM_LEVEL] = MAX_LEVEL;
929  }
930  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_ALLOW_GM_GROUP] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("GM.AllowInvite", false);
931  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_ALLOW_GM_FRIEND] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("GM.AllowFriend", false);
932  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_GM_LOWER_SECURITY] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("GM.LowerSecurity", false);
933  m_float_configs[CONFIG_CHANCE_OF_GM_SURVEY] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<float>("GM.TicketSystem.ChanceOfGMSurvey", 50.0f);
934 
935  m_int_configs[CONFIG_GROUP_VISIBILITY] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("Visibility.GroupMode", 1);
936 
937  m_int_configs[CONFIG_MAIL_DELIVERY_DELAY] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("MailDeliveryDelay", HOUR);
938 
939  m_int_configs[CONFIG_UPTIME_UPDATE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("UpdateUptimeInterval", 10);
940  if (int32(m_int_configs[CONFIG_UPTIME_UPDATE]) <= 0)
941  {
942  LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "UpdateUptimeInterval (%i) must be > 0, set to default 10.", m_int_configs[CONFIG_UPTIME_UPDATE]);
943  m_int_configs[CONFIG_UPTIME_UPDATE] = 1;
944  }
945 
946  if (reload)
947  {
948  m_timers[WUPDATE_UPTIME].SetInterval(m_int_configs[CONFIG_UPTIME_UPDATE]*MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS);
949  m_timers[WUPDATE_UPTIME].Reset();
950  }
951 
952  // log db cleanup interval
953  m_int_configs[CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARINTERVAL] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("LogDB.Opt.ClearInterval", 10);
954  if (int32(m_int_configs[CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARINTERVAL]) <= 0)
955  {
956  LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "LogDB.Opt.ClearInterval (%i) must be > 0, set to default 10.", m_int_configs[CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARINTERVAL]);
957  m_int_configs[CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARINTERVAL] = 10;
958  }
959  if (reload)
960  {
961  m_timers[WUPDATE_CLEANDB].SetInterval(m_int_configs[CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARINTERVAL] * MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS);
962  m_timers[WUPDATE_CLEANDB].Reset();
963  }
964  m_int_configs[CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARTIME] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("LogDB.Opt.ClearTime", 1209600); // 14 days default
965  LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Will clear `logs` table of entries older than %i seconds every %u minutes.",
966  m_int_configs[CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARTIME], m_int_configs[CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARINTERVAL]);
967 
968  m_int_configs[CONFIG_TELEPORT_TIMEOUT_NEAR] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("TeleportTimeoutNear", 25); // pussywizard
969  m_int_configs[CONFIG_TELEPORT_TIMEOUT_FAR] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("TeleportTimeoutFar", 45); // pussywizard
970  m_int_configs[CONFIG_MAX_ALLOWED_MMR_DROP] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("MaxAllowedMMRDrop", 500); // pussywizard
971  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_ENABLE_LOGIN_AFTER_DC] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("EnableLoginAfterDC", true); // pussywizard
972  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_DONT_CACHE_RANDOM_MOVEMENT_PATHS] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("DontCacheRandomMovementPaths", true); // pussywizard
973

995  {

997  m_int_configs[CONFIG_MAX_OVERSPEED_PINGS] = 2;
998  }

1010  if (val != m_int_configs[CONFIG_EXPANSION])
1011  LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Expansion option can't be changed at worldserver.conf reload, using current value (%u).", m_int_configs[CONFIG_EXPANSION]);
1012  }

1177 
1178  if (int32 clientCacheId = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("ClientCacheVersion", 0))
1179  {
1180  // overwrite DB/old value
1181  if (clientCacheId > 0)
1182  {
1183  m_int_configs[CONFIG_CLIENTCACHE_VERSION] = clientCacheId;
1184  LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Client cache version set to: %u", clientCacheId);
1185  }
1186  else
1187  LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "ClientCacheVersion can't be negative %d, ignored.", clientCacheId);
1188  }
1189 
1190  m_int_configs[CONFIG_INSTANT_LOGOUT] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("InstantLogout", SEC_MODERATOR);
1191 
1192  m_int_configs[CONFIG_GUILD_EVENT_LOG_COUNT] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("Guild.EventLogRecordsCount", GUILD_EVENTLOG_MAX_RECORDS);
1193  if (m_int_configs[CONFIG_GUILD_EVENT_LOG_COUNT] > GUILD_EVENTLOG_MAX_RECORDS)
1194  m_int_configs[CONFIG_GUILD_EVENT_LOG_COUNT] = GUILD_EVENTLOG_MAX_RECORDS;
1195  m_int_configs[CONFIG_GUILD_BANK_EVENT_LOG_COUNT] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("Guild.BankEventLogRecordsCount", GUILD_BANKLOG_MAX_RECORDS);
1196  if (m_int_configs[CONFIG_GUILD_BANK_EVENT_LOG_COUNT] > GUILD_BANKLOG_MAX_RECORDS)
1197  m_int_configs[CONFIG_GUILD_BANK_EVENT_LOG_COUNT] = GUILD_BANKLOG_MAX_RECORDS;
1198 
1199  //visibility on continents
1200  m_MaxVisibleDistanceOnContinents = sConfigMgr->GetOption<float>("Visibility.Distance.Continents", DEFAULT_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE);
1201  if (m_MaxVisibleDistanceOnContinents < 45 * sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO))
1202  {
1203  LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Visibility.Distance.Continents can't be less max aggro radius %f", 45 * sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO));
1204  m_MaxVisibleDistanceOnContinents = 45 * sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO);
1205  }
1206  else if (m_MaxVisibleDistanceOnContinents > MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE)
1207  {
1208  LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Visibility.Distance.Continents can't be greater %f", MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE);
1209  m_MaxVisibleDistanceOnContinents = MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE;
1210  }
1211 
1212  //visibility in instances
1213  m_MaxVisibleDistanceInInstances = sConfigMgr->GetOption<float>("Visibility.Distance.Instances", DEFAULT_VISIBILITY_INSTANCE);
1214  if (m_MaxVisibleDistanceInInstances < 45 * sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO))
1215  {
1216  LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Visibility.Distance.Instances can't be less max aggro radius %f", 45 * sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO));
1217  m_MaxVisibleDistanceInInstances = 45 * sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO);
1218  }
1219  else if (m_MaxVisibleDistanceInInstances > MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE)
1220  {
1221  LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Visibility.Distance.Instances can't be greater %f", MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE);
1222  m_MaxVisibleDistanceInInstances = MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE;
1223  }
1224 
1225  //visibility in BG/Arenas
1226  m_MaxVisibleDistanceInBGArenas = sConfigMgr->GetOption<float>("Visibility.Distance.BGArenas", DEFAULT_VISIBILITY_BGARENAS);
1227  if (m_MaxVisibleDistanceInBGArenas < 45 * sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO))
1228  {
1229  LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Visibility.Distance.BGArenas can't be less max aggro radius %f", 45 * sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO));
1230  m_MaxVisibleDistanceInBGArenas = 45 * sWorld->getRate(RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO);
1231  }
1232  else if (m_MaxVisibleDistanceInBGArenas > MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE)
1233  {
1234  LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Visibility.Distance.BGArenas can't be greater %f", MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE);
1235  m_MaxVisibleDistanceInBGArenas = MAX_VISIBILITY_DISTANCE;
1236  }
1237 
1239  m_int_configs[CONFIG_CHARDELETE_METHOD] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("CharDelete.Method", 0);
1240  m_int_configs[CONFIG_CHARDELETE_MIN_LEVEL] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("CharDelete.MinLevel", 0);
1241  m_int_configs[CONFIG_CHARDELETE_KEEP_DAYS] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("CharDelete.KeepDays", 30);
1242 
1244  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_ITEMDELETE_METHOD] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("ItemDelete.Method", 0);
1245  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_ITEMDELETE_VENDOR] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("ItemDelete.Vendor", 0);
1246  m_int_configs[CONFIG_ITEMDELETE_QUALITY] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("ItemDelete.Quality", 3);
1247  m_int_configs[CONFIG_ITEMDELETE_ITEM_LEVEL] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("ItemDelete.ItemLevel", 80);
1248 
1249  m_int_configs[CONFIG_FFA_PVP_TIMER] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("FFAPvPTimer", 30);
1250 
1251  m_int_configs[CONFIG_LOOT_NEED_BEFORE_GREED_ILVL_RESTRICTION] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("LootNeedBeforeGreedILvlRestriction", 70);
1252 
1254  std::string dataPath = sConfigMgr->GetOption<std::string>("DataDir", "./");
1255  if (dataPath.empty() || (dataPath.at(dataPath.length() - 1) != '/' && dataPath.at(dataPath.length() - 1) != '\\'))
1256  dataPath.push_back('/');
1257 
1258 #if AC_PLATFORM == AC_PLATFORM_UNIX || AC_PLATFORM == AC_PLATFORM_APPLE
1259  if (dataPath[0] == '~')
1260  {
1261  const char* home = getenv("HOME");
1262  if (home)
1263  dataPath.replace(0, 1, home);
1264  }
1265 #endif
1266 
1267  if (reload)
1268  {
1269  if (dataPath != m_dataPath)
1270  LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "DataDir option can't be changed at worldserver.conf reload, using current value (%s).", m_dataPath.c_str());
1271  }
1272  else
1273  {
1274  m_dataPath = dataPath;
1275  LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Using DataDir %s", m_dataPath.c_str());
1276  }
1277 
1278  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_VMAP_INDOOR_CHECK] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("vmap.enableIndoorCheck", 0);
1279  bool enableIndoor = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("vmap.enableIndoorCheck", true);
1280  bool enableLOS = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("vmap.enableLOS", true);
1281  bool enableHeight = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("vmap.enableHeight", true);
1282  bool enablePetLOS = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("vmap.petLOS", true);
1283 
1284  if (!enableHeight)
1285  LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "VMap height checking disabled! Creatures movements and other various things WILL be broken! Expect no support.");
1286 
1287  VMAP::VMapFactory::createOrGetVMapMgr()->setEnableLineOfSightCalc(enableLOS);
1288  VMAP::VMapFactory::createOrGetVMapMgr()->setEnableHeightCalc(enableHeight);
1289  LOG_INFO("server.loading", "WORLD: VMap support included. LineOfSight:%i, getHeight:%i, indoorCheck:%i PetLOS:%i", enableLOS, enableHeight, enableIndoor, enablePetLOS);
1290 
1291  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_PET_LOS] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("vmap.petLOS", true);
1292  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_START_ALL_SPELLS] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("PlayerStart.AllSpells", false);
1293  m_int_configs[CONFIG_HONOR_AFTER_DUEL] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("HonorPointsAfterDuel", 0);
1294  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_START_ALL_EXPLORED] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("PlayerStart.MapsExplored", false);
1295  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_START_ALL_REP] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("PlayerStart.AllReputation", false);
1296  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_ALWAYS_MAXSKILL] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("AlwaysMaxWeaponSkill", false);
1297  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_PVP_TOKEN_ENABLE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("PvPToken.Enable", false);
1298  m_int_configs[CONFIG_PVP_TOKEN_MAP_TYPE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("PvPToken.MapAllowType", 4);
1299  m_int_configs[CONFIG_PVP_TOKEN_ID] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("PvPToken.ItemID", 29434);
1300  m_int_configs[CONFIG_PVP_TOKEN_COUNT] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("PvPToken.ItemCount", 1);
1301  if (m_int_configs[CONFIG_PVP_TOKEN_COUNT] < 1)
1302  m_int_configs[CONFIG_PVP_TOKEN_COUNT] = 1;
1303 
1304  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_NO_RESET_TALENT_COST] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("NoResetTalentsCost", false);
1305  m_int_configs[CONFIG_TOGGLE_XP_COST] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("ToggleXP.Cost", 100000);
1306  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_SHOW_KICK_IN_WORLD] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("ShowKickInWorld", false);
1307  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_SHOW_MUTE_IN_WORLD] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("ShowMuteInWorld", false);
1308  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_SHOW_BAN_IN_WORLD] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("ShowBanInWorld", false);
1309  m_int_configs[CONFIG_INTERVAL_LOG_UPDATE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("RecordUpdateTimeDiffInterval", 300000);
1310  m_int_configs[CONFIG_MIN_LOG_UPDATE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("MinRecordUpdateTimeDiff", 100);
1311  m_int_configs[CONFIG_NUMTHREADS] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("MapUpdate.Threads", 1);
1312  m_int_configs[CONFIG_MAX_RESULTS_LOOKUP_COMMANDS] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("Command.LookupMaxResults", 0);
1313 
1314  // Warden
1315  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_WARDEN_ENABLED] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("Warden.Enabled", true);
1316  m_int_configs[CONFIG_WARDEN_NUM_MEM_CHECKS] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("Warden.NumMemChecks", 3);
1317  m_int_configs[CONFIG_WARDEN_NUM_LUA_CHECKS] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("Warden.NumLuaChecks", 1);
1318  m_int_configs[CONFIG_WARDEN_NUM_OTHER_CHECKS] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("Warden.NumOtherChecks", 7);
1319  m_int_configs[CONFIG_WARDEN_CLIENT_BAN_DURATION] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("Warden.BanDuration", 86400);
1320  m_int_configs[CONFIG_WARDEN_CLIENT_CHECK_HOLDOFF] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("Warden.ClientCheckHoldOff", 30);
1321  m_int_configs[CONFIG_WARDEN_CLIENT_FAIL_ACTION] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("Warden.ClientCheckFailAction", 0);
1322  m_int_configs[CONFIG_WARDEN_CLIENT_RESPONSE_DELAY] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("Warden.ClientResponseDelay", 600);
1323 
1324  // Dungeon finder
1325  m_int_configs[CONFIG_LFG_OPTIONSMASK] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("DungeonFinder.OptionsMask", 5);
1326 
1327  // Max instances per hour
1328  m_int_configs[CONFIG_MAX_INSTANCES_PER_HOUR] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("AccountInstancesPerHour", 5);
1329 
1330  // AutoBroadcast
1331  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_AUTOBROADCAST] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("AutoBroadcast.On", false);
1332  m_int_configs[CONFIG_AUTOBROADCAST_CENTER] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("AutoBroadcast.Center", 0);
1333  m_int_configs[CONFIG_AUTOBROADCAST_INTERVAL] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("AutoBroadcast.Timer", 60000);
1334  if (reload)
1335  {
1336  m_timers[WUPDATE_AUTOBROADCAST].SetInterval(m_int_configs[CONFIG_AUTOBROADCAST_INTERVAL]);
1337  m_timers[WUPDATE_AUTOBROADCAST].Reset();
1338  }

1341  m_int_configs[CONFIG_DB_PING_INTERVAL] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("MaxPingTime", 30);
1342

1345  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_PDUMP_NO_OVERWRITE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("PlayerDump.DisallowOverwrite", true);
1346  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_ENABLE_MMAPS] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("MoveMaps.Enable", true);
1347  MMAP::MMapFactory::InitializeDisabledMaps();
1348

1350  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_WINTERGRASP_ENABLE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("Wintergrasp.Enable", false);
1351  m_int_configs[CONFIG_WINTERGRASP_PLR_MAX] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("Wintergrasp.PlayerMax", 100);
1352  m_int_configs[CONFIG_WINTERGRASP_PLR_MIN] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("Wintergrasp.PlayerMin", 0);

1357

1362  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_ENABLE_CONTINENT_TRANSPORT_PRELOADING] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("IsPreloadedContinentTransport.Enabled", false);

1371

1377

1389  m_int_configs[CONFIG_PACKET_SPOOF_BANMODE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("PacketSpoof.BanMode", (uint32)0);
1390  if (m_int_configs[CONFIG_PACKET_SPOOF_BANMODE] > 1)
1391  m_int_configs[CONFIG_PACKET_SPOOF_BANMODE] = (uint32)0;
1392

1394

1396  m_int_configs[CONFIG_BG_REWARD_WINNER_HONOR_FIRST] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("Battleground.RewardWinnerHonorFirst", 30);

1398  m_int_configs[CONFIG_BG_REWARD_WINNER_HONOR_LAST] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("Battleground.RewardWinnerHonorLast", 15);
1399  m_int_configs[CONFIG_BG_REWARD_WINNER_ARENA_LAST] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("Battleground.RewardWinnerArenaLast", 0);
1400  m_int_configs[CONFIG_BG_REWARD_LOSER_HONOR_FIRST] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("Battleground.RewardLoserHonorFirst", 5);
1401  m_int_configs[CONFIG_BG_REWARD_LOSER_HONOR_LAST] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("Battleground.RewardLoserHonorLast", 5);
1402

1404 
1405  m_int_configs[CONFIG_DUNGEON_ACCESS_REQUIREMENTS_PRINT_MODE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("DungeonAccessRequirements.PrintMode", 1);

1414  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_DEBUG_BATTLEGROUND] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("Debug.Battleground", false);
1415  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_DEBUG_ARENA] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("Debug.Arena", false);
1416 
1417  m_int_configs[CONFIG_GM_LEVEL_CHANNEL_MODERATION] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("Channel.ModerationGMLevel", 1);
1418

1420 
1421  // Specifies if IP addresses can be logged to the database
1422  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_ALLOW_LOGGING_IP_ADDRESSES_IN_DATABASE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("AllowLoggingIPAddressesInDatabase", true, true);
1423 
1424  // LFG group mechanics.
1425  m_int_configs[CONFIG_LFG_MAX_KICK_COUNT] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("LFG.MaxKickCount", 2);
1426  if (m_int_configs[CONFIG_LFG_MAX_KICK_COUNT] > 3)
1427  {
1428  m_int_configs[CONFIG_LFG_MAX_KICK_COUNT] = 3;
1429  LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "LFG.MaxKickCount can't be higher than 3.");
1430  }
1431 
1432  m_int_configs[CONFIG_LFG_KICK_PREVENTION_TIMER] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("LFG.KickPreventionTimer", 15 * MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS) * IN_MILLISECONDS;
1433  if (m_int_configs[CONFIG_LFG_KICK_PREVENTION_TIMER] > 15 * MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS)
1434  {
1435  m_int_configs[CONFIG_LFG_KICK_PREVENTION_TIMER] = 15 * MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS;
1436  LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "LFG.KickPreventionTimer can't be higher than 15 minutes.");
1437  }
1438 
1439  // Realm Availability
1440  m_bool_configs[CONFIG_REALM_LOGIN_ENABLED] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("World.RealmAvailability", true);
1441 
1442  // call ScriptMgr if we're reloading the configuration
1443  sScriptMgr->OnAfterConfigLoad(reload);
1444 }

3338 {
3339  uint32 oldMSTime = getMSTime();
3340 
3341  _globalPlayerDataStore.clear();
3342  QueryResult result = CharacterDatabase.Query("SELECT guid, account, name, gender, race, class, level FROM characters WHERE deleteDate IS NULL");
3343  if (!result)
3344  {
3345  LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded 0 Players data.");
3346  return;
3347  }
3348 
3349  uint32 count = 0;
3350 
3351  // query to load number of mails by receiver
3352  std::map<uint32, uint16> _mailCountMap;
3353  QueryResult mailCountResult = CharacterDatabase.Query("SELECT receiver, COUNT(receiver) FROM mail GROUP BY receiver");
3354  if (mailCountResult)
3355  {
3356  do
3357  {
3358  Field* fields = mailCountResult->Fetch();
3359  _mailCountMap[fields[0].GetUInt32()] = uint16(fields[1].GetUInt64());
3360  } while (mailCountResult->NextRow());
3361  }
3362 
3363  do
3364  {
3365  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
3366  ObjectGuid::LowType guidLow = fields[0].GetUInt32();
3367 
3368  // count mails
3369  uint16 mailCount = 0;
3370  std::map<uint32, uint16>::const_iterator itr = _mailCountMap.find(guidLow);
3371  if (itr != _mailCountMap.end())
3372  mailCount = itr->second;
3373 
3374  AddGlobalPlayerData(
3375  guidLow, /*guid*/
3376  fields[1].GetUInt32(), /*accountId*/
3377  fields[2].GetString(), /*name*/
3378  fields[3].GetUInt8(), /*gender*/
3379  fields[4].GetUInt8(), /*race*/
3380  fields[5].GetUInt8(), /*class*/
3381  fields[6].GetUInt8(), /*level*/
3382  mailCount, /*mail count*/
3383  0 /*guild id*/);
3384 
3385  ++count;
3386  } while (result->NextRow());
3387 
3388  LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded %d Players data in %u ms", count, GetMSTimeDiffToNow(oldMSTime));
3389  LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
3390 }

383  bool found = false;
384 
385  for (; iter != m_QueuedPlayer.end(); ++iter, ++position)
386  {
387  if (*iter == sess)
388  {
389  sess->SetInQueue(false);
390  sess->ResetTimeOutTime(false);
391  iter = m_QueuedPlayer.erase(iter);
392  found = true;
393  break;
394  }
395  }
396 
397  // if session not queued then it was an active session
398  if (!found)
399  {
400  ASSERT(sessions > 0);
401  --sessions;
402  }
403 
404  // accept first in queue
405  if ((!GetPlayerAmountLimit() || sessions < GetPlayerAmountLimit()) && !m_QueuedPlayer.empty())
406  {
407  WorldSession* pop_sess = m_QueuedPlayer.front();
408  pop_sess->SetInQueue(false);
409  pop_sess->ResetTimeOutTime(false);
410  pop_sess->SendAuthWaitQueue(0);
411  pop_sess->SendAccountDataTimes(GLOBAL_CACHE_MASK);
412 
413  FinalizePlayerWorldSession(pop_sess);
414 
415  m_QueuedPlayer.pop_front();
416 
417  // update iter to point first queued socket or end() if queue is empty now
418  iter = m_QueuedPlayer.begin();
419  position = 1;
420  }
421 
422  // update queue position from iter to end()
423  for (; iter != m_QueuedPlayer.end(); ++iter, ++position)
424  (*iter)->SendAuthWaitQueue(position);
425 
426  return found;
427 }
World::GetActiveSessionCount
uint32 GetActiveSessionCount() const
Definition: World.h:184

Definition: WorldSession.cpp:820

◆ SetInitialWorldSettings()

void World::SetInitialWorldSettings ( )
virtual

Initialize the World.

  • Server startup begin
  • Initialize the random number generator
  • Initialize detour memory management
  • Initialize VMapMgr function pointers (to untangle game/collision circular deps)
  • Initialize config settings
  • Initialize Allowed Security Level
  • Init highest guids before any table loading to prevent using not initialized guids in some code.
  • Check the existence of the map files for all starting areas.
  • Initialize pool manager
  • Initialize game event manager
  • Loading strings. Getting no records means core load has to be canceled because no error message can be output.
  • Update the realm entry in the database with the realm type from the config file
  • Custom Hook for loading DB items
  • Load the DBC files
  • Load dynamic data tables from the database
  • Handle outdated emails (delete/return)
  • Load AutoBroadCast
  • Load and initialize scripts
  • Initialize game time and timers
  • Initilize static helper structures
  • Initialize MapMgr
  • Initialize Battlegrounds
  • Initialize outdoor pvp
  • Initialize Battlefield
  • Initialize Warden

Implements IWorld.

Definition at line 1447 of file World.cpp.

1505  uint32 server_type;
1506  if (IsFFAPvPRealm())
1507  server_type = REALM_TYPE_PVP;
1508  else
1509  server_type = getIntConfig(CONFIG_GAME_TYPE);
1510 
1511  uint32 realm_zone = getIntConfig(CONFIG_REALM_ZONE);
1512 
1513  LoginDatabase.PExecute("UPDATE realmlist SET icon = %u, timezone = %u WHERE id = '%d'", server_type, realm_zone, realm.Id.Realm); // One-time query
1514 
1516  sScriptMgr->OnLoadCustomDatabaseTable();
1517

1919  LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Deleting invalid mail items...");
1920  LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
1921  CharacterDatabase.Execute("DELETE mi FROM mail_items mi LEFT JOIN item_instance ii ON mi.item_guid = ii.guid WHERE ii.guid IS NULL");
1922  CharacterDatabase.Execute("DELETE mi FROM mail_items mi LEFT JOIN mail m ON mi.mail_id = m.id WHERE m.id IS NULL");
1923  CharacterDatabase.Execute("UPDATE mail m LEFT JOIN mail_items mi ON m.id = mi.mail_id SET m.has_items=0 WHERE m.has_items<>0 AND mi.mail_id IS NULL");

1973  LoginDatabase.PExecute("INSERT INTO uptime (realmid, starttime, uptime, revision) VALUES(%u, %u, 0, '%s')",
1974  realm.Id.Realm, uint32(m_startTime), GitRevision::GetFullVersion()); // One-time query
1975 
1976  m_timers[WUPDATE_WEATHERS].SetInterval(1 * IN_MILLISECONDS);
1977  m_timers[WUPDATE_AUCTIONS].SetInterval(MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS);
1978  m_timers[WUPDATE_AUCTIONS].SetCurrent(MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS);
1979  m_timers[WUPDATE_UPTIME].SetInterval(m_int_configs[CONFIG_UPTIME_UPDATE]*MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS);
1980  //Update "uptime" table based on configuration entry in minutes.
1981 
1982  m_timers[WUPDATE_CORPSES].SetInterval(20 * MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS);
1983  //erase corpses every 20 minutes
1984  m_timers[WUPDATE_CLEANDB].SetInterval(m_int_configs[CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARINTERVAL]*MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS);
1985  // clean logs table every 14 days by default
1986  m_timers[WUPDATE_AUTOBROADCAST].SetInterval(getIntConfig(CONFIG_AUTOBROADCAST_INTERVAL));
1987 
1988  m_timers[WUPDATE_PINGDB].SetInterval(getIntConfig(CONFIG_DB_PING_INTERVAL)*MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS); // Mysql ping time in minutes
1989 
1990  // our speed up
1991  m_timers[WUPDATE_5_SECS].SetInterval(5 * IN_MILLISECONDS);
1992 
1993  m_timers[WUPDATE_WHO_LIST].SetInterval(5 * IN_MILLISECONDS); // update who list cache every 5 seconds
1994

2065 
2066  LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Calculate Guild cap reset time...");
2067  LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
2068  InitGuildResetTime();
2069 
2070  LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Load Petitions...");
2071  sPetitionMgr->LoadPetitions();
2072 
2073  LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Load Petition Signs...");
2074  sPetitionMgr->LoadSignatures();
2075 
2076  LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Load Stored Loot Items...");
2077  sLootItemStorage->LoadStorageFromDB();
2078 
2079  LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Load Channel Rights...");
2080  ChannelMgr::LoadChannelRights();
2081 
2082  LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Load Channels...");
2083  ChannelMgr::LoadChannels();
2084 
2085 #ifdef ELUNA
2087  // in multithread foreach: run scripts
2088  sEluna->RunScripts();
2089  sEluna->OnConfigLoad(false, false); // Must be done after Eluna is initialized and scripts have run.
2090 #endif
2091 
2092  if (sWorld->getBoolConfig(CONFIG_PRELOAD_ALL_NON_INSTANCED_MAP_GRIDS))
2093  {
2094  LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Loading all grids for all non-instanced maps...");
2095 
2096  for (uint32 i = 0; i < sMapStore.GetNumRows(); ++i)
2097  {
2098  MapEntry const* mapEntry = sMapStore.LookupEntry(i);
2099 
2100  if (mapEntry && !mapEntry->Instanceable())
2101  {
2102  Map* map = sMapMgr->CreateBaseMap(mapEntry->MapID);
2103 
2104  if (map)
2105  {
2106  LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loading all grids for map %u", map->GetId());
2107  map->LoadAllCells();
2108  }
2109  }
2110  }
2111  }
2112 
2113  uint32 startupDuration = GetMSTimeDiffToNow(startupBegin);
2114 
2115  LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
2116  LOG_INFO("server.loading", "WORLD: World initialized in %u minutes %u seconds", (startupDuration / 60000), ((startupDuration % 60000) / 1000)); // outError for red color in console
2117  LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
2118 
2119  METRIC_EVENT("events", "World initialized", "World initialized in " + std::to_string(startupDuration / 60000) + " minutes " + std::to_string((startupDuration % 60000) / 1000) + " seconds");
2120 
2121  if (sConfigMgr->isDryRun())
2122  {
2123  LOG_INFO("server.loading", "AzerothCore dry run completed, terminating.");
2124  exit(0);
2125  }
2126 }

◆ ShutdownMsg()

void World::ShutdownMsg ( bool  show = false,
Player *  player = nullptr 
)
virtual

Display a shutdown message to the user(s)

  • Display a message every 12 hours, hours, 5 minutes, minute, 5 seconds and finally seconds

Implements IWorld.

Definition at line 2744 of file World.cpp.

2745 {
2746  // not show messages for idle shutdown mode
2747  if (m_ShutdownMask & SHUTDOWN_MASK_IDLE)
2748  return;
2749 
2751  if (show ||
2752  (m_ShutdownTimer < 5 * MINUTE && (m_ShutdownTimer % 15) == 0) || // < 5 min; every 15 sec
2753  (m_ShutdownTimer < 15 * MINUTE && (m_ShutdownTimer % MINUTE) == 0) || // < 15 min ; every 1 min
2754  (m_ShutdownTimer < 30 * MINUTE && (m_ShutdownTimer % (5 * MINUTE)) == 0) || // < 30 min ; every 5 min
2755  (m_ShutdownTimer < 12 * HOUR && (m_ShutdownTimer % HOUR) == 0) || // < 12 h ; every 1 h
2756  (m_ShutdownTimer > 12 * HOUR && (m_ShutdownTimer % (12 * HOUR)) == 0)) // > 12 h ; every 12 h
2757  {
2758  std::string str = secsToTimeString(m_ShutdownTimer).append(".");
2759 
2760  ServerMessageType msgid = (m_ShutdownMask & SHUTDOWN_MASK_RESTART) ? SERVER_MSG_RESTART_TIME : SERVER_MSG_SHUTDOWN_TIME;
2761 
2762  SendServerMessage(msgid, str.c_str(), player);
2763  LOG_DEBUG("server.worldserver", "Server is %s in %s", (m_ShutdownMask & SHUTDOWN_MASK_RESTART ? "restart" : "shuttingdown"), str.c_str());
2764  }
2765 }

◆ ShutdownServ()

void World::ShutdownServ ( uint32  time,
uint32  options,
uint8  exitcode 
)
virtual

Shutdown the server.

  • If the shutdown time is 0, set m_stopEvent (except if shutdown is 'idle' with remaining sessions)
  • Else set the shutdown timer and warn users

Implements IWorld.

Definition at line 2716 of file World.cpp.

2717 {
2718  // ignore if server shutdown at next tick
2719  if (IsStopped())
2720  return;
2721 
2722  m_ShutdownMask = options;
2723  m_ExitCode = exitcode;
2724 
2726  if (time == 0)
2727  {
2728  if (!(options & SHUTDOWN_MASK_IDLE) || GetActiveAndQueuedSessionCount() == 0)
2729  m_stopEvent = true; // exist code already set
2730  else
2731  m_ShutdownTimer = 1; //So that the session count is re-evaluated at next world tick
2732  }
2734  else
2735  {
2736  m_ShutdownTimer = time;
2737  ShutdownMsg(true);
2738  }
2739 
2740  sScriptMgr->OnShutdownInitiate(ShutdownExitCode(exitcode), ShutdownMask(options));
2741 }

◆ Update()

void World::Update ( uint32  diff)
virtual

Update the World !

  • Update the different timers
  • Update the game time and check for shutdown time
  • Update Who List Cache

Handle daily quests reset time

Handle weekly quests reset time

Handle monthly quests reset time

Handle session updates when the timer has passed

Handle weather updates when the timer has passed

Clean logs table

  • Update objects when the timer has passed (maps, transport, creatures, ...)

Update uptime table

  • Erase corpses once every 20 minutes
  • Process Game events when necessary
  • Ping to keep MySQL connections alive

2265  if (m_gameTime > m_NextWeeklyQuestReset)
2266  {
2267  ResetWeeklyQuests();
2268  }
2269 
2271  if (m_gameTime > m_NextMonthlyQuestReset)
2272  {
2273  ResetMonthlyQuests();
2274  }
2275  }
2276 
2277  if (m_gameTime > m_NextRandomBGReset)
2278  {
2279  METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Reset random BG"));
2280  ResetRandomBG();
2281  }
2282 
2283  if (m_gameTime > m_NextCalendarOldEventsDeletionTime)
2284  {
2285  METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Delete old calendar events"));
2286  CalendarDeleteOldEvents();
2287  }
2288 
2289  if (m_gameTime > m_NextGuildReset)
2290  {
2291  METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Reset guild cap"));
2292  ResetGuildCap();
2293  }
2294 
2295  // pussywizard:
2296  // acquire mutex now, this is kind of waiting for listing thread to finish it's work (since it can't process next packet)
2297  // so we don't have to do it in every packet that modifies auctions
2298  AsyncAuctionListingMgr::SetAuctionListingAllowed(false);
2299  {
2300  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> guard(AsyncAuctionListingMgr::GetLock());
2301 
2302  // pussywizard: handle auctions when the timer has passed
2303  if (m_timers[WUPDATE_AUCTIONS].Passed())
2304  {
2305  METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update expired auctions"));
2306 
2307  m_timers[WUPDATE_AUCTIONS].Reset();
2308 
2309  // pussywizard: handle expired auctions, auctions expired when realm was offline are also handled here (not during loading when many required things aren't loaded yet)
2310  sAuctionMgr->Update();
2311  }
2312 
2313  AsyncAuctionListingMgr::Update(diff);
2314 
2315  if (m_gameTime > mail_expire_check_timer)
2316  {
2317  sObjectMgr->ReturnOrDeleteOldMails(true);
2318  mail_expire_check_timer = m_gameTime + 6 * 3600;
2319  }
2320 
2321  {
2323  METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update sessions"));
2324  UpdateSessions(diff);
2325  }
2326  }
2327 
2328  // end of section with mutex
2329  AsyncAuctionListingMgr::SetAuctionListingAllowed(true);
2330 
2332  if (m_timers[WUPDATE_WEATHERS].Passed())
2333  {
2334  m_timers[WUPDATE_WEATHERS].Reset();
2335  WeatherMgr::Update(uint32(m_timers[WUPDATE_WEATHERS].GetInterval()));
2336  }
2337 
2339  if (sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARTIME) > 0) // if not enabled, ignore the timer
2340  {
2341  if (m_timers[WUPDATE_CLEANDB].Passed())
2342  {
2343  METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Clean logs table"));
2344 
2345  m_timers[WUPDATE_CLEANDB].Reset();
2346 
2347  LoginDatabasePreparedStatement* stmt = LoginDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(LOGIN_DEL_OLD_LOGS);
2348 
2349  stmt->setUInt32(0, sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARTIME));
2350  stmt->setUInt32(1, uint32(time(0)));
2351 
2352  LoginDatabase.Execute(stmt);
2353  }
2354  }
2355 
2356  {
2357  METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update LFG 0"));
2358  sLFGMgr->Update(diff, 0); // pussywizard: remove obsolete stuff before finding compatibility during map update
2359  }
2360

2404  if (m_timers[WUPDATE_UPTIME].Passed())
2405  {

2407

void World::UpdateSessions ( uint32  diff)
virtual
  • Add new sessions
  • Then send an update signal to remaining ones
  • and remove not active sessions from the list

Implements IWorld.

2805  METRIC_TAG("parent_type", "Update sessions"));
2806 
2808  WorldSession* sess = nullptr;
2809  while (addSessQueue.next(sess))
2810  {
2811  AddSession_(sess);
2812  }
2813  }

2819  ++next;
2820

2823  WorldSessionFilter updater(pSession);
2824

2827  {
2828  if (!RemoveQueuedPlayer(pSession) && getIntConfig(CONFIG_INTERVAL_DISCONNECT_TOLERANCE))
2829  m_disconnects[pSession->GetAccountId()] = time(nullptr);
2830  m_sessions.erase(itr);

2832  SessionMap::iterator iter;

2834  {
2835  WorldSession* tmp = iter->second;
2836  m_offlineSessions.erase(iter);
2837  tmp->SetShouldSetOfflineInDB(false);
2838  delete tmp;
2839  }

2841  m_offlineSessions[pSession->GetAccountId()] = pSession;
2842  continue;
2843  }
2844

2847

2849  {
2850  if (!RemoveQueuedPlayer(pSession) && getIntConfig(CONFIG_INTERVAL_DISCONNECT_TOLERANCE))
2851  m_disconnects[pSession->GetAccountId()] = time(nullptr);
2852  m_sessions.erase(itr);

2855  delete pSession;
2856  }
2857  }
2858 
2859  // pussywizard:
2860  if (m_offlineSessions.empty())
2861  return;

2863  for (SessionMap::iterator itr = m_offlineSessions.begin(), next; itr != m_offlineSessions.end(); itr = next)
2864  {
2865  next = itr;
2866  ++next;
2867  WorldSession* pSession = itr->second;
2868  if (!pSession->GetPlayer() || pSession->GetOfflineTime() + 60 < currTime || pSession->IsKicked())

2871  if (m_sessions.find(pSession->GetAccountId()) != m_sessions.end())
2872  pSession->SetShouldSetOfflineInDB(false); // pussywizard: don't set offline in db because new session for that acc is already created
2873  delete pSession;
2874  }
2875  }
